ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Davis,Bill Ward,Richard Doxsee,Don Orehek,John Severin,Gray Morrow,Bill Everett
ComicInfo.Inker: Jack Davis,Bill Ward,Richard Doxsee,Don Orehek,John Severin,Gray Morrow,Bill Everett
ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Space Shut-Ups!; Superstitions; Home Town Confidential; Restaurants to Make You Feel at Home!; It Could Be Verse; Everyday People to Advertise the Product; A House for Every Pool; Alaska; It Never Happened... But Someday - It Might!; The Last of the Hollywood B Pictures; Do's and Dont's; Tips to the World Tourist; Personalized Cigarette Lighters; Romeo and Juliet; All We Wanna' Know Is... You Call This a Shape?; Situations Wanted; Modern Movie Monsters; Ya Pays Yer Money and Ya Takes Yer Cherce; Interplanetary Magazines
ComicInfo.Summary:
The story of Romeo and Juliet is updated to a contemporary American city.
A man tries to exercise to slim out his belly but all the weight goes to his posterior.
A man must chose between two doors: behind one is a woman, behind the other, a lion. He takes a third option: the men's room.
Magazine covers from alien worlds.
